name: Fruit Salad (DEMO)
description:
A 2D shooter where you destroy fruits with a cannon. While it sounds simple, keep in mind that the fruits are going to defend themselves.

Featuring:

  • Various fruits, each one behaving differently!
  • Intense battles against tough bosses!
  • A fitting soundtrack with chiptune elements!
  • A manual that describes the enemies of the game, which can be found in the menu!

This is just the demo, having only one location (2 if you count the tutorial). I have no idea when will the entire game be done, but it'll have more than 4 times the content it has right now, so that's cool.
